data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

i have sent all cases with no previous capturer details back into the queue.
I have found that the Verifier some how calls the method twice according to history, which clears the previous capturer ID's which in turn cannot assign the cases to anyone and just piles up.

I will create a new task to investigate that issues.

Please note that i have also included an extra count item called "Awaiting Previous Capture" which states how many cases are waiting for a previous capture to be assigned to the case.

Please note that there are no images being uplifted at the moment.
